title: Aries Moon: A Novel
description: Those born with the moon in Aries are known for their turbulent emotions. Ty, with a tortured life behind him, meets the beautiful Astrid. Her easy worldliness attracts him, but together they are shadowed by a dangerous presence. Who or what this is becomes all consuming for everyone involved. Will their growing passion survive the threat? An impossible-to-put-down suspenseful story of intrigue and romance that will shock the reader at its twisted conclusion. This novel is the first in the Zodiac Series.
author: H.E. Nordquist
